JobDesc: Founded in 2012, IXIS is rooted in innovative processes for data-driven digital experience and strategic online planning. Our mission is to integrate and synchronize traditional and digital marketing initiatives to recalibrate and connect brands across converging media. We offer competitive compensation packages including health, dental, and vision insurance, flexible work schedules, and exceptional growth opportunities.Overview:

IXIS is seeking an experienced engineer to join our team in developing cutting-edge, custom analytics and dashboarding solutions with experience building Single Page Applications using modern frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue. In this role, you will collaborate with and lead other engineers and data scientists to build dashboards, interface with secure APIs, and follow best practices around CI/CD and test-driven development. This is a full-time, on-site position at our office in downtown Burlington, VT. Note: remote work is currently practiced due to COVID-19 social distancing.Our technology stack:

JavaScript/Typescript (React, Node.js, Jest, Cypress), Python, Bootstrap, Docker, Serverless, Cloud-based infrastructure using Amazon Web Services, PostgreSQL, RResponsibilities: Build enterprise-grade front-end applications and dashboards leveraging React, CSS-in-JS, and the AWS cloud platformCreate and maintain reusable and scalable front-end components via Material UIOptimize existing applications to improve performance and stabilityTake a test and behavior driven approach to development by writing unit, integration, and end-to-end testsWork with team to design and implement REST APIsCollaborate with technical, data science, QA, and operational resourcesLearn about and share: new ideas, methodologies, techniques, and technology through mentoring, pair programming, and code reviewsRequired Education and Skills:B.A./B.S. in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent experience3-5 years of professional experience building resilient, scalable, and performant enterprise-grade applications in a production environment, with a focus on Front-end development3-5 years of real-world experience with a modern JavaScript framework like React, Angular, or VueExperience building or contributing to a design system and/or component libraryExperience consuming REST APIs requiring authentication and authorizationA test-driven approach to software developmentCore critical thinking skills, including good data intuitionAdditional Desired Skills:Full-stack experience contributing to REST APIsExperience working with D3, Highcharts, Billboard or similar to create data visualizationsExperience working with SQL and NoSQL databasesExperience building CI/CD pipelinesWorking knowledge of how to utilize Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to provision, augment, and maintain cloud-based deploymentsDevelopment experience in a Linux or Mac environmentOur Mission:

Our mission is to revolutionize our clients' relationship with their data to actualize desired outcomes and reimagine their opportunities.Our Values: CuriosityCollaborationIntegrityResultsInnovationAll candidates must be legally authorized to work in the US, as we are unable to sponsor or transfer Visas at this time.Job Type: Full-timeBenefits:401(k)Dental insuranceHealth insurancePaid time offVision insuranceSchedule:Monday to FridayEducation:Bachelor's (Preferred)Work authorization:United States (Required)Work Location:Multiple locationsWork Remotely:Temporarily due to COVID-19

JobDesc: Senior Software EngineerAfficient Academy is looking for a highly competent full-stack software engineer with a solid experience especially in front-end developmentRESPONSIBILITIESArchitect and build new features using React, AngularJS, NodeJS and Python.Understand internal and customer requests and creatively implement desired features.Manage the AWS infrastructure and associated servicesCollaborate with internal and external team members on the requirements and delivery of new functionalities.QUALIFICATIONSExperience developing cloud-hosted, responsive web applications using JavaScript, HTML5, CSS.High proficiency with client-side JavaScript frameworks (preferably React/Redux), server side frameworks (preferably NodeJS) and NoSQL databases (preferably MongoDB)3+ years of industry experience in a software engineering role, preferably building microservice products.Experience collaborating directly with product teams and designers, and a proven track record of delivering successful new products.Demonstrate active pursuit of optimizing CI/CD process and tools, testing frameworks and practicesExperience in some development/server provisioning, deployment, and maintenance.Experience with our technology stack: JavaScript, React, NodeJS; Express; Graphql/Apollo; Python/Flask; CI/CD; AWS; Mongodb; Docker.HOW TO APPLYSubmit a resume and a cover letter explaining why you are the right fit for this position and why you are interested in working with Afficient Academy.ABOUT AFFICIENT ACADEMYAfficient Academy, Inc. was founded in 2014 in Silicon Valley, California. Afficient Academy’s AI-based methodology drastically enhances the learning effectiveness. With its state-of-the-art approach to building a solid academic foundation, Afficient Academy’s intelligent personalized programs ensure students achieve outstanding results efficiently. To learn more about Afficient Academy visit: www.afficienta.com.Job Type: Full-timePay: $100,000.00 - $150,000.00 per yearWork Location:One locationWork Remotely:Temporarily due to COVID-19
